author: JeffJrShim#2396, Guacaplushy#0577
name: RandomNoa
install_msg: Thanks for installing RandomNoa. Run `[p]help RandomD4DJ` to get a random D4DJ card! Cards used here are normally based on the Japanese version of the game. *(totally not because they get the good stuff first)* If you need any help, feel free to join my server, at https://discord.gg/RSAetqdhRU and ask at the #noa-cogs channel.
description: Fetch an official D4DJ card, from the D4DJ Groovy Mix game.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data about users
